text: Elfriede Jelinek (; born 20 October 1946) is an Austrian playwright and novelist. She won the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2004. Jelinek was born in MÃ¼rzzuschlag, Styria, Austria. Her best known works are The Piano Teacher, Die Kinder der Toten, Greed and Lust. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian playwrights Category:European novelists Category:Austrian Nobel Prize winners
title: Elfriede Jelinek
